item.title: CVE-2024-6407|2024-07-23T18:26:28.645Z -- schneider%20electric -- wiser%20home%20controller%20whc-5918a
item.description: CWE-200: Information Exposure vulnerability exists that could cause disclosure of credentials when a specially crafted message is sent to the device.
